The comment discusses the reputation of Virginia Tech (VT), stating that it is considered a very strong university in fields of STEM. The speaker equates its reputation to that of Pennsylvania State University (PSU) and the University of Maryland (UMD). From the words "equal to PSU", we can deduce that the speaker considers VT and PSU of the same caliber in terms of their reputation especially in the STEM field. 

They neither strictly prefer one over the other nor do they say that either of them is inferior to the other. Hence, it's safe to say that the speaker holds an equal preference for both Pennsylvania State University (Option A) and Virginia Tech (Option B).

### 
Equal preference
